columns.Last Name: VARCHAR - Applicant's last name/surname. Column name: [Last Name]
columns.Name(s): VARCHAR - Applicant's first name(s). Column name: [Name(s)]
columns.Date of Birth (Y): INTEGER - Year of birth. Column name: [Date of Birth (Y)]
columns.Country: VARCHAR - Country of origin. Column name: Country
columns.Gender (f / m / d): VARCHAR - Gender (f=female, m=male, d=diverse). Column name: [Gender (f / m / d)]
columns.Present Position: VARCHAR - Current job position or role. Column name: [Present Position]
columns.Name of Home Institution: VARCHAR - Name of applicant's home institution. Column name: [Name of Home Institution]
columns.Location of Home Institution: VARCHAR - Geographic location of home institution. Column name: [Location of Home Institution]
columns.Contact E-Mail address: VARCHAR - Email address for contact. Column name: [Contact E-Mail address]
columns.Track (A / P): VARCHAR - Application track (A=Academic, P=Professional). Column name: [Track (A / P)]
columns.Academic Degree(s) (and / or Training): VARCHAR - Academic qualifications and degrees. Column name: [Academic Degree(s) (and / or Training)]
columns.Year of PhD: INTEGER - Year when PhD was obtained. Column name: [Year of PhD]
columns.Discipline: VARCHAR - Academic or professional discipline. Column name: Discipline
columns.Title of proposed project: VARCHAR - Title of the fellowship project proposal. Column name: [Title of proposed project]
columns.Thematic relation: VARCHAR - How project relates to program themes. Column name: [Thematic relation]
columns.Begin of Fellowship: DATE - Proposed fellowship start date. Column name: [Begin of Fellowship]
columns.End of Fellowship: DATE - Proposed fellowship end date. Column name: [End of Fellowship]
columns.Duration in month: INTEGER - Fellowship duration in months. Column name: [Duration in month]
columns.Advisory Board Reviewer 1: VARCHAR - Name of first advisory board reviewer. Column name: [Advisory Board Reviewer 1]
columns.Advisory Board Reviewer 2: VARCHAR - Name of second advisory board reviewer. Column name: [Advisory Board Reviewer 2]
columns.Review Katja: VARCHAR - Review comments from Katja. Column name: [Review Katja]
columns.Review Manuel: VARCHAR - Review comments from Manuel. Column name: [Review Manuel]
columns.Rating Katja: VARCHAR - Rating grade from Katja (A, B, C, etc.). Column name: [Rating Katja]
columns.Rating Manuel: VARCHAR - Rating grade from Manuel (A, B, C, etc.). Column name: [Rating Manuel]
columns.Comments: VARCHAR - Additional comments or notes about the application. Column name: Comments

notes: IMPORTANT: Column names with spaces or special characters MUST be enclosed in square brackets in SQL queries
Example: SELECT [Gender (f / m / d)], [Track (A / P)] FROM testlistAIA
Simple column names like Country, Discipline, Comments do NOT need brackets
Always use [Column Name] syntax for: Last Name, Name(s), Date of Birth (Y), Gender (f / m / d), Track (A / P), etc.

applicants_by_track.description: Number of applicants per track (Academic vs Professional)

rating_distribution.formula: COUNT(*) GROUP BY Rating Katja, Rating Manuel

gender_distribution.formula: COUNT(*) GROUP BY Gender (f / m / d)

examples.pattern: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_applicants FROM testlistAIA
SELECT [Track (A / P)] as track, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY [Track (A / P)] ORDER BY count DESC

examples.description: Top 5 countries by number of applicants
examples.pattern: SELECT Country, COUNT(*) as applicant_count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Country ORDER BY applicant_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG([Duration in month]) as avg_duration_months FROM testlistAIA WHERE [Duration in month] IS NOT NULL

examples.description: Applicants with highest ratings from both reviewers
examples.pattern: SELECT [Last Name], [Name(s)], Country, [Rating Katja], [Rating Manuel] FROM testlistAIA WHERE [Rating Katja] = 'A' AND [Rating Manuel] = 'A'
SELECT [Gender (f / m / d)] as gender, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY [Gender (f / m / d)]
SELECT Discipline, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Discipline ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT [Last Name], [Name(s)], [Begin of Fellowship], [End of Fellowship] FROM testlistAIA WHERE [Begin of Fellowship] LIKE '%2024%'

glossary.Track (A / P): Application track: A = Academic (researchers with PhD), P = Professional (practitioners without PhD requirement)
glossary.Rating: Assessment grade: A = Excellent, B = Good, C = Satisfactory, lower grades indicate concerns
glossary.Fellowship Duration: Length of proposed fellowship in months, typically ranging from 3-12 months
glossary.Home Institution: The applicant's current affiliated organization (university, research center, company)
glossary.Thematic relation: How the proposed project connects to the fellowship program's focus areas
glossary.Gender: f = female, m = male, d = diverse/non-binary
